test_description: Test Filecoin integration with MCP server

details.name: test_status_success
details.description: Test that the status endpoint returns a successful response when the FilecoinModel reports success

details.name: test_status_failure
details.description: Test that the status endpoint returns a failure response when the FilecoinModel reports failure

details.name: test_list_wallets_success
details.description: Test that the wallets endpoint returns a successful list of wallets

details.name: test_list_wallets_failure
details.description: Test that the wallets endpoint raises a 500 error when the FilecoinModel reports failure

details.name: test_wallet_balance_success
details.description: Test that the wallet balance endpoint returns a successful wallet balance

details.name: test_create_wallet_success
details.description: Test that the create wallet endpoint returns a successful wallet creation response

details.name: test_list_miners_success
details.description: Test that the miners endpoint returns a successful list of miners

details.name: test_list_deals_success
details.description: Test that the deals endpoint returns a successful list of deals

details.name: test_ipfs_to_filecoin_success
details.description: Test that the IPFS to Filecoin endpoint returns a successful operation result

details.name: test_filecoin_to_ipfs_success
details.description: Test that the Filecoin to IPFS endpoint returns a successful operation result

details.name: test_cross_backend_operations
details.description: Test that both cross-backend operations work together in a full round-trip

notes: Tests were run with a mock FilecoinModel implementation due to missing dependencies for the actual Lotus daemon. Tests focused on verifying that the controller correctly transforms model responses into HTTP responses and handles error conditions properly.
